name: FlashQuiz
0:
”Alexa Open Flash Quiz”
”Alexa tell flash quiz to start a quiz”
”Alexa tell flash quiz to use deck”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flash quiz
des:
This skill enables you to create custom flash cards with your voice. No need for additional accounts nor apps - everything is done right on your Alexa device. You can have multiple decks for different exams to keep your cards organized. Alexa can quiz you on your flash cards and let you know when you get it right or wrong.
To begin, create a deck, and then create cards within that deck. When you are ready to be quizzed say, 'start a quiz'.
When are finished with your deck feel free to delete the deck with the 'delete deck' command.
If you don't remember the names of your decks you can also ask, "List my decks?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
